content: A budget-friendly 2-day Manali itinerary includes visits to Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, Mall Road, Old Manali, Vashisht Hot Springs, and Rohatang Pass.  Expect to spend ₹6,100-₹10,500 (₹12,200-₹21,000 for two) covering accommodation, food, transport, and activities.  Pre-booking accommodation and avoiding peak season are recommended.

A 2-day budget Manali itinerary includes visits to Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, Mall Road, Old Manali, Vashisht Hot Springs, Rohatang Pass, and the Manali Museum.  Expect to spend ₹6,100-₹10,500 (₹12,200-₹21,000 for two) covering accommodation, food, transport, and activities.  Pre-booking accommodation and avoiding peak season are recommended.

A budget-friendly 2-day Manali itinerary includes visits to Hadimba Temple, Manu Temple, Mall Road, Old Manali, Vashisht Hot Springs, Rohatang Pass, and the Manali Museum.  Expect to spend ₹6,100-₹10,500 (₹12,200-₹21,000 for two) covering accommodation, food, transport, and activities.  Pre-booking accommodation and avoiding peak season (June-September) are recommended.
